bibl.title: A. Maria van Erp Taalman Kip and S.R. Slings, Some Recently Found Greek Poems, Text and Commentary.
bibl.note: Archiloque: P. Oxy. XXII, 2310 (= Pack2 125), fr. 1, col.1, 1-39; P. Köln II, 58. - Hipponax: P. Oxy. XVIII, 2176 (= Pack2 551). - Alcée: P. Oxy. XXI, 2303 (= Pack2 71); P. Köln II, 59. - Stésichore: P. Lille Inv. 73; 76; 111c [ed.: P.J. Parsons, ZPE 26 (1977)]. Réédition, notes et commentaires.
bibl.seg: Bremer J. M., A. Maria van Erp Taalman Kip and S.R. Slings, Some Recently Found Greek Poems, Text and Commentary. (Mnemosyne. Supplementum 99.)
Leiden, E.J. Brill, 1987, 8°, viii-177 pp. et 8 pll.

Archiloque: P. Oxy. XXII, 2310 (= Pack2 125), fr. 1, col.1, 1-39; P. Köln II, 58. - Hipponax: P. Oxy. XVIII, 2176 (= Pack2 551). - Alcée: P. Oxy. XXI, 2303 (= Pack2 71); P. Köln II, 59. - Stésichore: P. Lille Inv. 73; 76; 111c [ed.: P.J. Parsons, ZPE 26 (1977)]. Réédition, notes et commentaires.

C.R. par Annie Bonnafé, AntCl 58 (1989) pp. 245-247. - Malcolm Davies, Gnomon 61 (1989) pp. 97-100. - Herwig Maehler, ArchPF 39 (1993) pp. 89-91. - Martin L. West, CR N.S., 39 (1989) pp. 9-11. - Wolfgang Luppe, Eirene 28 (1993) pp. 110-112.
Bremer Maria van Erp Taalman Kip Slings
